Module backend.domain.main
Package de.eatological.domain

Interface Repository

public interface Repository
Repository interface for the access and storage of data.

  • Method Details

    • getStatus

      boolean getStatus()
      Checks the status of the repository connection.
      Returns:
      true iff connection to database is successful

    • addToken

      Optional<String> addToken(String username)
      Add a token to start a new session.
      Parameters:
      username - String unique username that wants a token
      Returns:
      new token as String

    • removeToken

      boolean removeToken(String token)
      Remove a token to end a session.
      Parameters:
      token - String active token to remove
      Returns:
      true iff token was removed successfully

    • getUserByToken

      Optional<User> getUserByToken(String token)
      Identifies a user by giving a token.
      Parameters:
      token - String specifies a unique token
      Returns:
      User, if token was attributable, empty otherwise

    • getUserByName

      Optional<User> getUserByName(String username)
      Returns an user identified by his username.
      Parameters:
      username - String specifies the required user
      Returns:
      the user with the specified username (or empty if not found)

    • addUser

      boolean addUser(String username)
      Add a user with specified username and no related data.
      Parameters:
      username - String unique username for user
      Returns:
      true iff user was added successfully

    • updateUsername

      boolean updateUsername(String token, String username)
      Change name of user while keeping all related data.
      Parameters:
      token - String active token for present user
      username - String unused new username for same user
      Returns:
      true iff changing the name was successful

    • removeUser

      boolean removeUser(String token)
      Remove a user with all related data using specified username.
      Parameters:
      token - String session token used to delete the active user
      Returns:
      true iff user was removed successfully

    • getAllIngredients

      Set<Ingredient> getAllIngredients()
      Returns all persistently stored ingredients.
      Returns:
      Set of all ingredients

    • getUsedIngredients

      Set<Ingredient> getUsedIngredients()
      Returns stored ingredients used in >= 1 Recipe.
      Returns:
      Set of all used ingredients

    • getIngredientById

      Optional<Ingredient> getIngredientById(int id)
      Returns ingredient with specified id.
      Parameters:
      id - specifies the required ingredient uniquely
      Returns:
      Ingredient iff id exists

    • getRestrictions

      Set<String> getRestrictions()
      Get all names of diets that exist in dataset.
      Returns:
      Set of Strings, each representing one diet.

    • setRestriction

      boolean setRestriction(String token, String restriction)
      Set a diet for an authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      token - identifying token for authenticated user
      restriction - restriction that should be selected
      Returns:
      true iff change was successful

    • getRecipes

      Set<Recipe> getRecipes()
      Returns all persistently stored recipes.
      Returns:
      Set of all recipes

    • getRecipeById

      Optional<Recipe> getRecipeById(int id)
      Returns recipe with specified id.
      Parameters:
      id - specifies the required recipe uniquely
      Returns:
      Recipe iff id exists

    • setActivePlan

      boolean setActivePlan(String token, Plan plan)
      Updates the active plan of a user.
      Parameters:
      token - String of active session that identifies user
      plan - Plan that overwrites the currently acitve plan
      Returns:
      true iff replacing the plan was successful

    • setCooked

      Plan setCooked(String token, int recipeId)
      Alter current plan of user, authenticated by token. Set recipe with specified recipeId to cooked. Remove recipe-items from groceries.
      Parameters:
      token - String that authenticates user
      recipeId - int unique identifier for cooked recipe
      Returns:
      Active Plan of user after recipe was set to cooked

    • addHistoryEntry

      boolean addHistoryEntry(String token, int recipeId)
      Add a history entry for NOW and the user represented by token.
      Parameters:
      token - String of active session that identifies user
      recipeId - Integer id of recipe that should be added.
      Returns:
      true iff history entry was successful

    • setGrocery

      boolean setGrocery(String token, Grocery grocery)
      Adds or updates grocery entry for user.
      Parameters:
      token - String of active session that identifies user
      grocery - Grocery entry that should be saved / updated
      Returns:
      true iff adding / updating of grocery entry was successful

    • updateGrocery

      Set<Grocery> updateGrocery(String token, Set<Grocery> grocery)
      Updates grocery entry for user. Returns resulting set of groceries for specified user. Promises transactional robustness between reading/writing data.
      Parameters:
      token - String of active session that identifies user
      grocery - Grocery entry that should be saved / updated
      Returns:
      Set of groceries after the entry was saved / updated

    • removeGroceries

      boolean removeGroceries(String token)
      Removes all grocery entries of user.
      Parameters:
      token - String of active session that identifies user
      Returns:
      true iff removal was successful
